boardgame.name: Alien Artifacts
Artefakty Obcych
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Alien Artifacts is a 4X-style card game in which you play as an interplanetary faction, sending your research vessels into uncharted space to expand your knowledge and power. Build powerful ships, develop new technologies, and explore distant planets for anything _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or anyone _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; you can exploit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Alien Artifacts is built on a Resource engine - each turn you will have 3 Resource cards in your hand and you will decide how best to spend them. Each resource card has two different resource types for you to use. You can only use one side and only two cards per turn! Using these resources, you will build Ships, develop Technology, discover Planets, or Trade for currency!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Ships allow you to attack the aliens and gain their valuable artifacts which provide huge bonuses. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With each new Technology card in your Empire, you will have access to more actions, bonuses, and scoring opportunities. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each Planet you explore provides valuable resources for future actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are two sides to each of these cards, and as you build them you will decide:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Logistics - play cards on this side to gain ongoing bonuses that will make your Empire stronger and help you build faster._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Operational - play this side to gain a new way to score victory points (and yes, you will be able to activate your operations more than once, if you play well)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Manage your Resources, build the right cards, make wise choices. Win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Alien Artifacts provides a true 4X experience in under an hour. With over two hundred cards, Alien Artifacts offers players many scoring strategies and great replay-ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand new game UNOPENED just got from Portals pre-order with the extra factions. Just looking to get my money back on this I pre-ordered this before I got into Star Wars Destiny and that game has taken over my life as of late so dont see this hitting the table right now. Shipping for this will be between $10-15 US lower 48 states only depending on where you live. thanks
Opened but never played. Includes Pre-Order Promo Races

NIS copy of Alien Artifacts (in hand). Also has pre-order bonuses (2 new factions _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 8 new planets). Free shipping via USPS 2-day, local pickup accepted around 92620.

A New copy that I had ordered directly from Portal Games that comes with extras as a result. New in Shrink. Exclusive Extras from direct ordering from Portal Games: -Two new civs: Academics and Silics with their respective setup cards. -Special planet cards. Accept Paypal, and will ship in USA via USPS.
